Question: On February 24, 2003, this person conducted another interview with Hussein before the 2003 Invasion of Iraq.
Hints: In the book, Goldberg used this person as a primary example of a news anchor with a liberal bias.
It would be only a matter of time before this person reported on the Kennedy assassination.
In the aftermath of the incident, CBS fired multiple members of the CBS News staff but allowed this person to stay on.
